scripts.migrate: node -r dotenv/config node_modules/knex/bin/cli.js migrate:latest --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js --env production
scripts.seed: node -r dotenv/config node_modules/knex/bin/cli.js seed:run --specific=01_seed_samples.js --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js --env production
scripts.rollback: node -r dotenv/config node_modules/knex/bin/cli.js migrate:rollback --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js --env production
